SA10n1026:3: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate ||1 ||
SA10n1026:4: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet |
SA10n1026:6: yadyamībhya ime'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi |
SA10n1026:9: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam ||4 ||
SA10n1026:11: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ ||5 ||
SA10n1026:13: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat ||6 ||
SA10n1026:15: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam ||7 ||
SA10n1026:16: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam |
SA10n1026:20: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate |
